Reference

Twitch API

Directly interact with the Twitch API.

Authenticate

twitch_auth()

Get auth token

Bits

get_cheermotes()

Retrieves the list of available Cheermotes

Clips

get_all_clips()

Get all clips

get_clips()

Get clips

Games

get_games()

Get games

get_top_games()

Get top games

Search

search_categories()

Search for games or categories

search_channels()

Search channels

Tags

get_all_stream_tags()

Get all stream tags

get_stream_tags()

Get stream tags

Users

get_all_follows()

Get all follows

get_follows()

Get follows

get_schedule()

Get schedule

get_users()

Get users

Videos

get_all_videos()

Get all follows

get_videos()

Get video information

Hidden Endpoints

For more information on hidden endpoints click here.

get_chatters()

Get a broadcasters current chatters
